tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mission_control_communication_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    recipient VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AstronautCommunication (
    comm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    comm_type VARCHAR(50),
    comm_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    comm_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
   log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   communication_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   mission_id INT REFERENCES mission_control(mission_id),
   astronaut_id INT REFERENCES astronauts(astronaut_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mission_control (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  rank VARCHAR(50),
  mission_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE missions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(50),
  launch_date DATE,
  landing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender VARCHAR(50),
  receiver VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE spaceships (
  spaceship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  spaceship_name VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT,
  mission_id INT
)
